tool_description: Organizes and manages social media content calendars with scheduling, conflict detection, and campaign coordination across multiple platforms.

calendar_name.description: Name identifier for the content calendar

start_date.description: Calendar start date in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: Calendar end date in ISO 8601 format

content_themes.description: Content themes or categories to organize

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format
Invalid platforms: Each platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Calendar name conflict: A calendar with this name already exists
Invalid posting frequency: Must be one of [daily, weekly, bi-weekly]
Date range too long: Calendar period cannot exceed 1 year
usage: Create a content calendar by specifying name, date range, and platforms. Optionally organize with themes, set posting frequency, and add campaign tags for better management.

calendar_id.description: Unique identifier for the created calendar

total_slots.description: Total available posting slots in the calendar

filled_slots.description: Number of slots with scheduled content

calendar_url.description: URL to access the calendar interface
